law.catch_line: It is a fraudulent insurance act for a person, with the purpose of submitting a claim under a policy...
law.text:
It is a fraudulent insurance act for a person, with the purpose of submitting a claim under a policy of motor vehicle insurance, to organize, plan, or knowingly participate in:
an intentional motor vehicle accident; or
a scheme to create documentation of a motor vehicle accident that did not occur.
